    • Method Detail

      • getUpdateStrategy

        public String getUpdateStrategy()
        This method gets the identifier of the strategy used for (incremental) updates of this SearchSource. This property is of interest for the search-indexer and can be ignored for the search-engine (due to the lack of full generic support in JAXB we decided NOT to move this method to a sub-interface in the search-indexer-api).
        The default update-type is SearchIndexerSource.UPDATE_STRATEGY_LAST_MODIFIED that should work for all locations/resources that have a modification date. Besides SearchIndexerSource.UPDATE_STRATEGY_NONE there is also SearchIndexerSource.UPDATE_STRATEGY_VCS available.
        Specified by:
        getUpdateStrategy in interface SearchIndexerSource
        Returns:
        the type of the update mechanism or null if no delta-update-indexing shall be performed. Use one of the UPDATE_TYPE_* constants. The default implementation uses maven-scm as abstraction layer on VCS. In such case this is the role-hint for the scm-provider.
        See Also:
        SearchIndexerSource.UPDATE_STRATEGY_LAST_MODIFIED, SearchIndexerSource.UPDATE_STRATEGY_VCS, SearchIndexerSource.UPDATE_STRATEGY_NONE

      • setUpdateStrategy

        public void setUpdateStrategy(String updateStrategy)
        This method sets the update-strategy.
        Parameters:
        updateStrategy - is the new value to set.
